overview_of_class: Methods for solving linear, ordinary, and partial differential equations of mathematical physics. Green's functions, distribution theory, integral equations, transforms, potential theory, diffusion equation, wave equation, maximum principles, and variational methods.
name: Differential Equations of Mathematical Physics
title: MEAS ES_APPM 411-2-20 Differential Equations of Mathematical Physics
